  • class HttpInterfaceFactory

Detailed Description

Class for requests comming from outside mc2 that uses HTTP.

Reads the header and body from a socket.

Definition at line 32 of file HttpInterfaceRequest.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum HttpInterfaceRequest::chunked_body_t [private]
 

The chunked body states.

Enumeration values:
reading_chunk_size  Reading chunk size.
reading_chunk  Reading a chunk.
reading_chunk_crlf  Reading CRLF after a chunk.
reading_chunk_trailer  Reading trailer.

Definition at line 239 of file HttpInterfaceRequest.h.

enum HttpInterfaceRequest::io_state_t [private]
 

The IO states.

Enumeration values:
initial_hand_shake  Initial handchake.
reading_start_line  Reading start line.
reading_header  Reading header.
reading_request_body  Reading body.
reading_request_body_chunked  Reading body chunked.
writing_reply_header  Writing reply header.
writing_reply_body  Writing reply body.
io_done  Done.
io_error  Error.
io_uninitalized  Uninitalized.

virtual void HttpInterfaceRequest::handleIO (  bool  readyRead,
bool  readyWrite
)  [virtual]
 

Read and or write is ready make the IO.

May only call read/write once and only if readyRead/readyWrite is true.

Implements SelectableInterfaceRequest.

Reimplemented in LoggingHttpInterfaceRequest.

virtual void HttpInterfaceRequest::handleOverloaded (  int  overLoad  )  [virtual]
 

The server is overloaded make mimimal reply with that status.

Make a 503 reply.

Implements SelectableInterfaceRequest.

void HttpInterfaceRequest::setReply (  HttpHeader *  outHead,
HttpBody *  outBody
) 
 

Sets the http reply, is now owned by this class.

bool HttpInterfaceRequest::setStatusReply (  uint32  statusNbr,
uint32  retryTime = 0,
vector< MC2String > *  extraHeaderFields = NULL
) 
 

Sets a standard reply indicated by the statusNbr.

Returns false if the statusNbr is unknown and the standard error "500 Internal Server Error" is sent.

Parameters:
statusNbr is the number of the standard reply.
retryTime Used if statusNbr == 503 to tell client how long to wait before retrying.
extraHeaderFields A list of extra header fields to send with the reply, default NULL.

virtual void HttpInterfaceRequest::terminate (   )  [virtual]
 

The irequest should try to get done as soon as possible.

This means that reuse of IO for another read of user request is not wanted, Keep-Alive is set to close.

Reimplemented from SelectableInterfaceRequest.

virtual void HttpInterfaceRequest::timedout (   )  [virtual]
 

There was a timeout, change state.

Implements SelectableInterfaceRequest.

Reimplemented in LoggingHttpInterfaceRequest.

const uint32 HttpInterfaceRequest::MAX_LINE_LENGTH [static, protected]
 

Maximum length of a line.

Maximum size of incomming body is 2^8 times max line length.
